channel.title: Comments on: MSNBCâ€™s Martin Bashir on The Paul Edwards Program

item.title: By: Andrew Thornquist
item.dc:creator: Andrew Thornquist
item.description: I agree that Bashir's faith was not irrelevant in the interview with Bell, and I'm glad that is the case. I'm not sure if an unbeliever would have been so blunt in pressing the issues.
item.content:encoded: I agree that Bashir’s faith was not irrelevant in the interview with Bell, and I’m glad that is the case. I’m not sure if an unbeliever would have been so blunt in pressing the issues.
